metadata.title: CVE-2024-26855 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:ice: Fix potential NULL pointer dereference in ice_bridge_setlink() Thefunction ice_bridge_setlink() may encounter a NULL pointer dereference ifnlmsg_find_attr() returns NULL and br_spec is dereferenced subsequently innla_for_each_nested(). To address this issue, add a check to ensure thatbr_spec is not NULL before proceeding with the nested attribute iteration.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26855` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-112-generic - 5.15.0-112.122
linux-image-5.15.0-112-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-112.122
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-112-generic - 5.15.0-112.122
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-112-generic-64k - 5.15.0-112.122
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1060-kvm - 5.15.0-1060.65
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1063-aws - 5.15.0-1063.69
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1056-ibm - 5.15.0-1056.59
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1058-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1058.64
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-110-lowlatency - 5.15.0-110.120
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-110-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-110.120
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1058-nvidia - 5.15.0-1058.59
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1058-nvidia-lowlatency - 5.15.0-1058.59
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-112.122').
